posts.post_content:
After selling about half of my little stash of 1909 Obaks on the Net 54 auction venue, I'm going to try a fixed price sale. Any that remain unsold about a week from now will go to auction.

Price is $75.

The buyer will be the first person to "claim" the card at my price on this thread. Payment can be via PayPal, check or m.o.

Card is technically Good-Very Good. Looks EX at first glance, but has a couple of "bends" (not creases) visible on front, some spots of paste residue on back and a purple rubber-stamped "23" on back, and a bit of purple ink bleed on front left border.

Brashear appeared in all three Obak sets. In 1902 he played most of the 1902 season as a utility player with the St. Louis Cardinals.

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=3801&d=1249045501[/IMG]
